data: The rifle lay comfortably in his hands, a gleaming precision instrument that exuded a faint odor of gun oil and powder solvent.
Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin), 1916-2006; Emshwiller, Ed, 1925-1990 [Illustrator]
